list.name: DIGESTIVE
list.description: Cocooned enemies lose x% of their health while cocooned.
list.descriptionHtml: Cocooned enemies lose x% of their health while cocooned.

list.name: SLIMY
list.description: Cocoon leaves a slimy trail behind it for x seconds that slows down enemies walking over it.
list.descriptionHtml: Cocoon leaves a slimy trail behind it for x seconds that slows down enemies walking over it.
